mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.zuozhe_name as zuozheName ,a.zuozhe_phone as zuozhePhone ,a.zuozhe_id_number as zuozheIdNumber ,a.zuozhe_photo as zuozhePhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM zuozhe a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.zuozhe_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuozheName},'%')
and a.zuozhe_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuozhePhone},'%')
and a.zuozhe_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuozheIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
